__e: This is bigger than curing cancer.
Six months away from curing cancer and I give it up for this.
I can't see why anyone would want to stop a cure for disease.
Just as hate knows love's the cure
In case you haven't noticed, healing is not my strong suit.
Can you honestly say to yourself that her falling in love with you is just a part of her healing process, and that it has nothing to do with you?
You know, you probably should've spent a little more time finding a cure for what ails me.
Because he gave me the thing that you couldn't: the cure to my illness, embracing who I really am.

If my son is not too busy monitoring my cure, I'd like him to meet us.
Well, I command you to find the cure wherever it is in this world.
